title: LoL Installation Keeps Stopping At 266mb
body:
Hello all!

I need assistance, It will never finish the download, its really annoying me.

-I've re downloaded twice
-I've repaired
-I've tried to do it on different internet connections.

WTF is going on?

replies.body: Open the patcher and download as much as you can. When it stops downloading, disconnect your internet for a minute (either by turning off your modem or just unplugging it), and then reconnect. Make sure that it reconnected by visiting a page in your browser, and then wait five minutes. It should start downloading again.
This Does not work at all.

Well, it depends on what exactly the error you're getting is. I should have asked for that first before posting this :P

Could you describe the events which happen when you try to update *your* game?
